post.body: http://tinyurl.com/7obtaf this is attendant #2 (HOT, like smokin') What was I smokin'? is more like it
no pics of the spent attendant - she was so nice tho' - Frontier Air = great airline; flew all four legs w/ them
I haven't sent it yet.Getting baggage now. @djtravitron I'll email you - she's a 50/50 butterface - I only got her backside.
mistake to leave the house w/ hat and gloves; way colder here than PA - wierd, right?
Going to run errands; my office, best girls office, and deposit $ from my slow paying clients, who still pay by check; on foot w/ the dog.
torn on online personas; pro-life v. personal life - hatrs from pro-life stalk me (orly? do they?), but I want to share stuff w/ pals.
well golly, maybe I should upgrade to Flickr PRO?
New persona w/ this Flickr account: http://tinyurl.com/8hhchp Torn over using something like this or my real name, made a YT channel too.
while i do brush and floss everyday - i don't bring my sonicare on vaca - teeth feel like carpet. shag.
re: legs. I'm a married man. I meant the airline not the attendants
landed. @djtravitron Hot one wasnt that hot - got a pic. almost got in a fight midflight w/ a guy who was pissed about baby gorilla. fun.
Goodbye Denver. Mile High Metroplolis. Cold beer and fluffy Rocky Mountain powder.
lift off. I am now breaking about a dozen Federal and local laws.
'Flight attendants, prepae for departure and cross-check', says the friendly spent one.
I accept your challenge @djtravitron
spent but RReeaally nice
Attenant #1 cute attendant #2 HOT (like smokin) attendant #3 is SPENT
you can be my partner if i ever really do AR - wifey would whine and run too slow. That way when we win you earn your half.
Landed at Denver. On to the next flight Amazing Race style.
Akron to Denver. Denver to Seattle. God help us.
